cab.content: L9 153his Document Is the Property of153S E C R E T.BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 18th APRIL, 1918,1, Very heavy fighting has taken place all day between GIVENCHY and LOISNE. Repeated attacks have been driven "off with great loss to the enemy. We hold GIVENCHY and our line is everywhere intact^2/ The- Germans attacked south and south-east of 'KEMMEL this morning. It is believed that these attacks were only local and were repulsed.3. Otherwise there is no change in the situation.General Staff,War Office, s.W-.1.18th April, 1918,,Issued at 6.10 p.m.
